resources.string: Outpost Rush is a 20 vs 20 match that takes place on a large island with three Outposts.\nPlayers compete to capture and hold these Outposts for as long as possible, increasing their team's score in the process.

Ah, the meek little nun sends a sweet lambkin as her champion. Hehehe, how amusing... 

The little nun fears the Heretic. But the Heretic is a shadow… an empty skin... 

Tell little Sister 'Rosa' that Nedenyek has seen her…

Beloved Isabella? Where are you? I cannot find you... 

I have searched for so long… I am bone-weary... 

Something draws close… Isabella, is that you? Where is your light… your grace? 

Isabella, don't leave me in this darkness…
